CustomField.description: Enter a URL of an image to display in the Recent News section of the PRM homepage. This image will float to the left. If a banner image is required, choose one that is an appropriate size (TBD).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a URL of an image to display in the Recent News section of the PRM homepage. This image will float to the left. If a banner image is required, choose one that is an appropriate size (TBD).
CustomField.label: Image
